author: Barry Popik
title: ‚ÄúSnow hair, don‚Äôt care‚Äù
text:
‚ÄúSnow hair, don‚Äôt care‚Äù is a saying that has been
printed on many images. The speaker doesn‚Äôt care if snow gets in the hair‚Äîit‚Äôs what happens in winter.
‚ÄúSnow hair, don‚Äôt care‚Äù was posted on
X/Twitter by Zach Mazzotta on December 13, 2010. ‚ÄúSnow hair, don‚Äôt care!‚Äù was posted on https://twitter.com/TheHershlinger/status/144611455528996864 by Hershlinger on December 7, 2011. Authorship is unknown.
